name: Super Stacker 2
description:
The hit stacking game is finally on the iPhone and it's better than ever!


Pass each level by stacking all of the shapes without any falling off the screen. This is a challenging game of logic and skill that anybody can play - even your mum! If you're skilled enough to beat all 40 levels you can try them again in "Bonus Mode" and we'll see what you're really made of.


Things to do:

- Play through 40 levels of physics based fun.

- Cry as your stack collapses just before the timer runs out.

- Unlock bonus mode to randomize the order of shapes.

- Laugh at the horrified faces on the shapes as they fall.

- Reap the benefits of your new skills when you tidy your kitchen cupboards.



BUY THIS APP NOW! You won't regret it :)
